Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.gameComponents

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.gameComponents.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents the player who is playing the game
See Also:

    • initializeWorker

      public boolean initializeWorker​(Box box1, Box box2, Board board)
      This method sets the first position of a worker
      Parameters:
      box1 - is the number of the worker i want to set
      box2 - is the box where i want to set the worker
      board - game's board
      Returns:
      true if initialization is successful, else false

    • setPossibleMove

      public boolean setPossibleMove​(int indexWorker)
      This method calls the setPossibleMove in the playerStateManager
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - index of the worker which is getting the possible moves
      Returns:
      true if the worker can move

    • setPossibleBuild

      public boolean setPossibleBuild​(int indexWorker)
      This method calls the setPossibleBuild in the playerStateManager
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - index of the worker which is getting the possible builds
      Returns:
      true if is reachable

    • playWorker

      public boolean playWorker​(int indexWorker, Box pos)
      This method calls the moveWorker in the playerStateManager
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - index of the worker which is going to be moved
      pos - box where the worker is going to be moved
      Returns:
      false if the player can do another move because of god ability, otherwise returns true

    • playBlock

      public boolean playBlock​(Box pos)
      This method calls the moveBlock in the playerStateManager
      Parameters:
      pos - box where the player wants to build a block
      Returns:
      false if the player can do another move because of god ability, otherwise returns true

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin​(Box startedBox, Box finalBox)
      This method calls the checkWin in the playerStateManager and if the player wins, sets his state in Win
      Parameters:
      startedBox - starter box of the worker
      finalBox - box where the worker moved
      Returns:
      true if the player wins, otherwise returns false

    • checkWorkers

      public boolean checkWorkers()
      This method checks if at least one of the two workers can move
      Returns:
      false if no workers can move, otherwise returns true

    • checkWorker

      public boolean checkWorker​(int indexWorker)
      This method checks if a worker can move
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - index of the worker that is going to be checked
      Returns:
      false if the worker cannot move, otherwise returns true

    • checkBuilding

      public boolean checkBuilding​(int indexWorker)
      This method checks if a worker can build
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - index of the worker that is going to be checked
      Returns:
      false if the worker cannot move, otherwise returns true

    • canBuildBeforeWorkerMove

      public boolean canBuildBeforeWorkerMove()
      This method checks if the player have the ability to build before the worker move
      Returns:
      true if has this god ability, otherwise returns false

    • controlHeartBeat

      public void controlHeartBeat()
      This method resets the heartbeat counter if it receives a response from the client

    • incrementMissedHeartBeat

      public boolean incrementMissedHeartBeat()
      This method counts how many heartbeats a client misses
      Returns:
      true if the client misses the maximum number of heartbeats that could miss, otherwise returns false

    • setIndexPossibleBlock

      public void setIndexPossibleBlock​(int indexPossibleBlock)
      This method sets the index of the possible block that a player can build
      Parameters:
      indexPossibleBlock - index of the possible block
